SELECT cc.id,c.item_name AS itemName,(CASE cc.record_type WHEN 1 THEN '公告' ELSE '动态' END) AS recordType, cc.content,cc.likes,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM app_content_comment WHERE content_id=cc.id) AS comments, SUBSTRING(CAST(cc.create_time AS CHAR),1,16) AS createTime,s.value AS iconValue,u.user_name AS userName,u.logo_path AS logoPath, u.nick_name AS nickName,(CASE cc.is_report WHEN 1 THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) AS isReport,cc.logo_path AS logoPath1, cc.logo_path2 AS logoPath2,cc.logo_path3 AS logoPath3,(CASE cc.uid WHEN -1 THEN '动能集团官方' ELSE su.real_name END) AS realName FROM app_community_content cc INNER JOIN app_community c ON c.id=cc.community_id INNER JOIN sys_user su ON su.id=c.uid INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.id=cc.uid LEFT JOIN sys_setting s ON s.id=cc.icon_value WHERE cc.id=#{id}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT acc.id,acc.content,su.logo_path AS sendLogoPath,su.nick_name AS nickName, CONCAT_WS(',',acc.logo_path,acc.logo_path2,acc.logo_path3) AS logoPath,ss.value AS iconValue, SUBSTRING(CAST(acc.create_time AS CHAR),1,10) AS createTime,acc.likes,COUNT(acct.id) AS commentCounts, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM app_community_collection WHERE content_id=acc.id AND uid=#{uid}) as isPoint FROM app_community_content AS acc INNER JOIN sys_user AS su ON acc.uid = su.id LEFT JOIN sys_setting AS ss ON acc.icon_value = ss.id LEFT JOIN app_content_comment AS acct ON acc.id = acct.content_id GROUP BY acc.id ) AS a ORDER BY a.createTime DESC,a.likes DESC,a.commentCounts DESC LIMIT #{page},#{rows}
